content: I'm a fan, but know that there have been multiple attempts to standardize on something better than BIP32/44/39 and they all have failed.  Be prepared to spend a huge amount of effort pestering all of the stakeholders and potentially writing PRs yourself to many libraries/wallets in order to get something like this pushed through.
